Uddālaka Jātaka：The story of Uddālaka given above．It was related in reference to a monk who led a deceitful life．



The monk is identified with Uddālaka．（J．iii．232）．



The Jātaka is depicted in the Bhārhūt Tope （see Cunningham，Plate XLVI）．



On the same occasion were preached the Makkata，Kuhaka and Setaketu Jātakas．
